official_title: A joint resolution honoring Chad Knutson whose remarkably unselfish decision to donate his organs at his death made possible multiple life and sight-saving transplant operations.

summary.text: Pays tribute to Chad Knutson and his parents for his decision to donate his organs at his death which made possible multiple transplant operations.

titles.title: A joint resolution honoring Chad Knutson whose remarkably unselfish decision to donate his organs at his death made possible multiple life and sight-saving transplant operations.
